comment.author: 65901644@N00
comment._content: The streamliners appear to be one of the M-10003–6 trainsets, one of the E2 locomotives, and one of the later E6 locomotives. All were joint ownership between the C&NW, the Union Pacific, and (in the case of the City of San Francisco trains) the Southern Pacific.

comment.author: 86812298@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called freightyards, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
